thread.title: Over 220K Facebook users donated $15M to support Nepal earthquake relief - newsR
thread.title_full: Over 220K Facebook users donated $15M to support Nepal earthquake relief - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Over 220K Facebook users donated $15M to support Nepal earthquake relief - newsR
text: Nearly six months ago, a devastating 7.8-magnitude earthquake struck Nepal. Since that time, people around the world have been making donations and providing assistance to help rebuild the country. As an international platform aimed at connecting people, Facebook participated in this effort. Today it’s touting its success, thanks to both its Donate and Safety Check feature. […] »
